                          org.jhotdraw.draw.gui.JAttributeTextArea<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable, AttributeEditor<T>
public class JAttributeTextArea<T>
extends JLifeFormattedTextArea
implements AttributeEditor<T>

An entry field that can be used to edit an attribute of a Figure.

Version:
